faq.question: How long does it take to summarize a PDF?
faq.answer: Most PDFs are summarized in 10-30 seconds, depending on length. Even 100+ page documents are processed in under a minute.

faq.question: What types of PDFs can I summarize?
faq.answer: We support all PDF types including research papers, books, reports, presentations, and scanned documents with OCR.

faq.question: How accurate are the AI summaries?
faq.answer: Our AI is powered by Google Gemini, providing highly accurate summaries that capture key themes, arguments, and insights. We recommend reviewing summaries for critical decisions.

faq.question: Can I summarize multiple PDFs at once?
faq.answer: Yes! Pro and Team plans support batch upload, allowing you to process multiple documents simultaneously.

faq.question: Is there a file size limit?
faq.answer: Free users can upload files up to 10MB. Paid plans support files up to 100MB per document.
